name: DungeonWheels
description:
Hi!

We are Bene, "Mitch" and Jonny, "Pixel" and this is our very first little game ever: "DungeonWheels".

Creating the game, we were thinking about getting as many actions as possible to be done with that one button, we were allowed to use. This resoluted in the idea of "fortune wheels", that define your action.

Playing the game is pretty easy: you see two spinning fortune wheels and simply press Spacebar to stop it in it's current position which lets you choose between Move, Attack or Cast a Spell and a direction for this action.

Your goal for each level is to get past the slimes (you might have to defeat them!) onto the stairs, which will lead you to the next level.

Can you beat the boss in level 5??
